title: thiago007
author: thiago007
content: Bitcoin Attack ‚Äì # 31 Cryptocurrency story is a book that traces the history of Bitcoin from its creation to the year 2021Starting Bid: 0.004Bid Increments: .0001Sniping: Each bid in the last 5 minutes will extend auction an additional 5 from the last bid time, and so on until 5 minutes passes without a bidPayment : Bitcoin or Litecoin Shipping: from USA, Buyer is responsible for shipping or using escrow.Auction Ends: Tuesday 5/9 https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/to?iso=20220509T14&p0=1082&msg=Attack+Book&font=sanserif&csz=1

I can see the small bend/fold on both sides/pics?  I am 100% sure that they are not folded or something is hardcover, and so they come with a design, buy 2 and both are the same, here I leave a couple more photos so that you can see that they are from the printing house, I imagine.
